channel.title: Only good coders read this *HELP ME!*
channel.description:
oke im trieing to make a 525 server i got pur3zscape source and w00tscape source ive editted both of them allot
i also got the clients to connect whit they work when i open client it connects and i can play but when i close the client and try to open the client again it stops Connecting to ........ please wait it happened to both servers so the problem is: i can open client once it will load and i can play but second attempt of opening client doesnt work
idk how to fix it if you could help me i would be realy happy :D
Note: Whit evry source 525 even whitout editting it stil whont work only connects once then stop
Note: I yust tried to load client again it worked then i closed client and opened again it did not work it said error connecting to Js5.connect ore something in the commandpromp of the client. If someone could tell me how to get rid of this i wud rep him

item.title: Only good coders read this *HELP ME!*
item.dc:creator: @kambo77 kambo77
item.description:
@kambo77 wrote:

it is either your client or your server:

here are what the problems may be:
server: A timer delay whilst someone logs out, therefore either the delay or wait 5 minutes then reconnect.

client: Get a new one or its your client connection.

(maybe) your internet connection, if you’ve portforwarded and your using your Advertising IP. try using 0.0.0.0 instead of your advertising ip because 0.0.0.0 doesnt need a internet connection as long as your server is running. or maybe your internet connection (if your wireless) may be poor or very little therefore limited your connection speed.

hope that helped =]

Read full topic
item.source: Only good coders read this *HELP ME!*

item.title: Only good coders read this *HELP ME!*
item.dc:creator: @Rej3ctz Rej3ctz
item.description:
@Rej3ctz wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:3, topic:320284”][quote author=Nuggetdabest link=topic=416767.msg3064654#msg3064654 date=1261128708]
Not sure but, Mabye Ports in use or w/e, IP is wrong?
[/quote]
you obviously didn’t read the title -.-
when it stops at connecting to… then it means that the server is offline so perhaps when you disconnect from your server and close your client, perhaps there is an error produced and it stops running the server.[/quote]
How the f is that possible??

Read full topic
